name: Jus  price: 10  description: un jus de fruit frais  shop: Unknown  type: CLASSIC

name: It should not debit an advantage the customer does not have
It should not buy the Parking advantage with points if no license plate
It should buy the Parking advantage with points
expected: PointTransactionDTO\[customerDTO=CliCustomer{id=[0-9]+, name='Georges', points=80, euros=0.0, status=CLASSIC, licensePlate=896983}, avantageName=Parking, price=20\]

name: It should debit the Parking advantage
expected: AdvantageTransactionDTO\[customerDTO=CliCustomer{id=18, name='Georges', points=80, euros=0.0, status=CLASSIC, licensePlate=896983}, advantageName=Parking\]
